title: The Good Ol' Days Syndrome
body:
Hi. Did you ever see a movie as a child and think it was the greatest thing? amazing? like it was the best thing on the planet? then did you watch it again when you got older and were really let down?

that is our update 6.9

I hear tons of people saying how "clunky" and "underpowered" pretty much every reworked champ is...

I think y'all just have a case of the good ol' days syndrome.

from everything I have seen, they are incredibly similar, and even the champs with large changes like vlad... he is different, but by no means worse. I think once people adjust to his new playstyle, like all of the new champs, his winrate will go back up.

on a similar note, I love ken's new style on his ult.
